title: Elderflower jelly with easy strawberry ice cream
description: James Martin whips up an easy summer dessert that features a cheat's no-churn strawberry ice cream.
ingredients: ½ vanilla pod, seeds scraped out with a sharp knife
5 gelatine sheets, soaked in cold water for 5 minutes
1 peach, stone removed, flesh finely diced
50g/2oz small fresh strawberries, cut into quarters
small handful fresh basil leaves, preferably Greek basil
